text: 13.14 Lo 13.1, 13.4, 2 Te 2.9-10, Lep 12.9, 19.20 Pen God ne tap ladek kɨdeyɨl anop ñɨnen kelɨgek, binɨb lum awl nɨb okok nɨg yelaknɨŋ, kɨlop yepɨs yepɨs gin agɨl, tap mageptek anɨb okok gek, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl gup agɨl nɨgɨlak. Pen tap ladek anɨb ak, binɨb lum awl kɨlop mɨdupsek agak, Tap ladek nedil tu palawl ak ñag lel nɨm kumak ak pen, kɨm mɨdeb ak yɨb nop dad aplanɨmɨb agak. Dad aplanɨg, kawnan nop tek agnɨgep olap gɨlɨnɨmɨb agak. Agek, kawnan anɨb ak tek olap gɨlɨlak.
